import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components'; import BACKGROUND_IMAGE from '../../assets/Background.png' const Login = () => { return (
Email address Password Forgot password?
OR ) } export default Login const Background = styled.div` width: 100%; background-image:url(${BACKGROUND_IMAGE}) ; background-size: 100vw 100vh; background-repeat: no-repeat; object-fit: scale-down; height: 100vh; box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2000px rgba(255, 0, 150, 0.3); `;
